channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Two Tickets To Paradise
channel.desc: After being left at the alter by their respective partners, a bride and a groom encourage each other to still go on their honeymoons, not knowing they're heading to the same resort.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Journey Ahead
channel.desc: Embark on an epic road trip as two strangers - a famous actress and a young wilderness expert - drive from LA to New York together, learning life-changing lessons along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Branching Out
channel.desc: A single mum tracks down her daughter's biological father in a wild journey of trust, love and hope. As Ruby connects with her dad, could Amelia also be meeting the one.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Date Whisperer
channel.desc: Date Whispering is the new trend in dating and Sam is the best one in LA. But when her service is called upon by her dad's life coach, will she learn the real meaning of true love.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Haunted Wedding
channel.desc: The wedding between ghost hunters Jane and Brian at a haunted inn is disrupted by Angelique - a ghost who mistakes Brian for her own dead fianc?.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Writing a Love Song
channel.desc: When aspiring music producer Chloe lands her first gig working with former rising star Dustin, they race to create an epic song of the summer.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Campfire Romance
channel.desc: Romance rekindles for Peyton and her closest friends when her parents decide to host a holiday themed reunion before selling their family owned summer camp.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: An Easter Bloom
channel.desc: Struggling to save her farm, a woman enters a floral design contest, where she develops a blossoming romance with a local pastor.
